scripts.report: forge coverage --no-match-test testFuzz --ir-minimum --report lcov && perl -pi -e 's|#!/usr/bin/perl5.30|#!/usr/bin/perl|' $(which genhtml 2>/dev/null || echo /usr/local/Cellar/lcov/*/libexec/bin/genhtml) && genhtml -o report --branch-coverage --ignore-errors source lcov.info && rm lcov.info
